import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label } from "reactstrap"; export default function CustomerInfoPage(props){ const customerNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(false); props.setShippingNav(true); props.setPaymentNav(false); } const backCNavHandler = () => { props.setCustomerNav(true); props.setShippingNav(false); props.setPaymentNav(false); } return (
) }
